author: GamingBolt
description:
The Game Awards 2024 was finally here and it featured a ton of announcements. With old and forgotten video game IPs like Okami and Onimusha returning to new entries in existing franchises like Mafia and Dying Light being revealed, there is a lot to unpack with The Game Awards 2024.

There were a ton of major reveals backed up by exciting surprises in this year's game awards. Join us as we take a look at 20 of the biggest announcements that happened at the The Game Awards 2024.
title: 20 Game Reveals At The Game Awards 2024 THAT FREAKED US OUT
